casebody.data:
Lattimore, Appellant, v. Brown, Appellee.

[Cite as Lattimore v. Brown (1994), 69 Ohio St.3d 672.]

(No. 94-9 Submitted June 29, 1994 Decided July 27, 1994.) Marlene Penny Manes, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed and the cause is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings in accordance with Moskovitz v. Mt. Sinai Med. Ctr. (1994), 69 Ohio St.3d 638, 635 N.E.2d 331.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Wright, J., concurs in judgment only.
